traits.name: Living Shadow
entries: While in dim light or darkness, the dragon has resistance to damage that isn't force, psychic, or radiant.

traits.name: Shadow Stealth
entries: While in dim light or darkness, the dragon can take the Hide action as a bonus action.

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, the dragon has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The dragon makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
entries: Melee atk +11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 17 (2d10 + 6 damage) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6 damage) necrotic damage.

actions.name: Claw
entries: Melee atk +11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 13 (2d6 + 6 damage) slashing damage.

actions.name: Shadow Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon exhales shadowy fire in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 18 Dexterity saving throw, taking 56 (16d6 damage) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A humanoid reduced to 0 hit points by this damage dies, and an undead {@creature shadow} rises from its corpse and acts immediately after the dragon in the initiative count. The shadow is under the dragon's control.
